title: Trade court blocks Trump's tariffs | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Elon Musk leaves the Trump administration. | What is the Trump-Vance approach to crypto? | Oklahoma City Thunder are in the NBA Finals.

title: Iowa GOP lawmaker defends Trump tax bill amid town hall heckling
shortDescription: Iowa Republican Rep. Ashley Hinson faced a deluge of boos and shouts at two town halls over President Donald Trump's sweeping tax and policy bill.

title: Elon Musk leaves Trump administration
shortDescription: Elon Musk is leaving the Trump administration as his allotted 130 days as a "special government employee" ends.

title: Trump pardons governor convicted of corruption, rapper NBA YoungBoy
shortDescription: Trump pardoned NBA YoungBoy, a Louisiana-born rapper, and John Rowland, the former GOP governor of Connecticut.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump can't use a 1977 law to impose tariffs
shortDescription: Federal court hands the president's economic policy a major setback. Here is the news to know on Thursday.

title: Trump pardons former congressman Michael Grimm
shortDescription: Former Republican Congressman Michael Grimm has received a presidential pardon from Donald Trump, according to the White House.

title: Religious colleges get break in Trump bill as war with Harvard rages
shortDescription: Trump's spending bill, now headed to the Senate, would exempt religious colleges from a big tax increase on endowments.

title: Bukele's ruthless rise: MS-13 gang helped create Trump ally
shortDescription: Nayib Bukele rose to near-total control of El Salvador on a tide of support from the very gang he’s credited with defeating.

title: Raw display of power: Trump’s getting his military parade
shortDescription: Washington will host a parade for the Army's 250th anniversary. It coincides with Trump's birthday. U.S. military parades are rare.

title: Trump bid to deport Mahmoud Khalil likely unconstitutional: Judge
shortDescription: The Trump administration's attempt to deport Columbia graduate Mahmoud Khalil is likely unconstitutional, says federal judge.

title: Elon Musk leaves White House after contentious run as government slasher
shortDescription: Elon Musk has officially left the Trump White House, capping a turbulent effort to slash the federal government by the world's richest man.

title: In blow to President Trump's trade agenda, court blocks tariffs
shortDescription: The ruling from the United States Court of International Trade found Trump can't use a 1977 emergency powers law to impose tariffs.

title: Trump decries 'TACO trade' jab
shortDescription: President Trump was asked about the acronym “TACO,” which stands for "Trump always chickens out” - a jab coined by financial analysts.

title: Bird flu vaccine development cancelled by Trump administration
shortDescription: Moderna had been awarded over $750 million to develop a vaccine against bird flu, which has been circulating in farm animals and sickening people.

title: Trump-backed Gaza aid plan marred by stampede
shortDescription: People stampeded and shots were fired as a Trump-backed plan to distribute food in Gaza at sites guarded by armed contractors got started.

title: Trump erupts at Wall Street's 'TACO trade' nickname for his tariffs
shortDescription: The acronym stands for "Trump always chickens out" a jab at the president's propensity to impose or threaten steep tariffs and later back off.

title: Trump pardons former NY Congressman Michael Grimm for tax fraud
shortDescription: Grimm who represented Staten Island and parts of Brooklyn in Congress from 2011 to 2015, pleaded guilty in December 2014 to tax fraud.

title: Exclusive: Trump pardons former Army officer who disobeyed COVID rules
shortDescription: President Trump issued a full and unconditional pardon to a former U.S. army officer convicted of refusing to follow COVID-19 safety rules.

title: Musk criticizes Trump's bill: Key moments in the pair's partnership
shortDescription: Musk this week criticized Trump's megabill, signaling a change in the pair's whirlwind political partnership.

title: Donald Trump nominates personal attorney Emil Bove as federal judge
shortDescription: The president chose his former criminal defense attorney to sit on the bench in the appeals court based in Philadelphia.

title: Trump responds to Musk saying he's 'disappointed' in big tax bill
shortDescription: Donald Trump's sweeping tax legislation is expected to cost around $3.8 trillion over the next 10 years.

title: Trump says he'll look at pardoning Whitmer kidnapping plot convicts
shortDescription: Nine people were convicted or pleaded guilty to either federal or separate state charges in a plot to kidnap Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer.
